thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com | 7 of 9
thread.title: Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text:
When I found this company's website after hunting for days for the piece of furniture I bought, I thought I had hit the mother-lode. Great price, good looking furniture (I was spoiled for choice).
Took a long time in delivery though, and the interim communication was hard to get, but overall I am more than satisfied. I got what I paid for, when they said it would be delivered and we are very happy with the piece.
Thank You
